thread.title: BRIEF-Brazil trade balance seen $15 bln in 2015, $30 bln in 2016 - minister
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Brazil trade balance seen $15 bln in 2015, $30 bln in 2016 - minister | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Brazil trade balance seen $15 bln in 2015, $30 bln in 2016 - minister
text: Oct 15 * Trade Minister Armando Monteiro said on Thursday Brazil's trade balance would surpass $15 billion by the end of 2015 * Monteiro said he expects Brazil's 2016 trade surplus to reach roughly $30 billion (Writing by Reese Ewing ; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama )
